DOC.brief_summary: Under hypothesis dexmedetomidine sedation would result less upper airway obstruction , evaluate occurrence upper airway collapse requirement airway intervention patient obstructive sleep apnea dexmedetomidine propofol sedation .
DOC.criteria: Surgery spinal anesthesia Intraoperative sedation American Society Anesthesiology physical status 1 2 Apnea/hypopnea index ≥ 5/h WatchPAT 200 analysis Anatomical defect upper respiratory tract Psychotic disorder Drug addition Alcohol addition body mass index ≥ 35 kg/m2
